definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Whole body cast, rigid, and stable performance.
sentences.chinese: 机身整体铸造，刚性好，性能稳定。

sentences.english: Loading was achieved through a battery of hydraulic jacks acting on a rigid metallic distribution plate .
sentences.chinese: 通过作用于刚性金属垫板上的一组液压千斤顶加载。

sentences.english: Injection-molded full-length polypropylene lasting board delivers maximum rigidity and support.
sentences.chinese: 注射成型全长聚丙烯持久板提供了最大的刚性和支持。

sentences.english: For the annular membranes, the concentric rigid inclusion make the maximal deflection become smaller than circular membranes.
sentences.chinese: 当薄膜带有刚性中心时，能使薄膜的中心挠度减小。

sentences.english: The beam motion is divided into two parts: rigid rotation and flexible vibration.
sentences.chinese: 假设梁的运动由刚性回转与柔性振动两部分组成。

sentences.english: Objective To co-register multi-modal serial images by non-rigid transforming.
sentences.chinese: 目的对多模态非刚性变换序列图像进行配准。

sentences.english: Through a rigid sleeve coupling, pump shaft was connected to the motor shaft .
sentences.chinese: 通过一个刚性套筒联轴器，泵轴被连接至电机轴上。

sentences.english: Cushion is a core part in the rigid and semirigid composite foundation.
sentences.chinese: 褥垫层是刚性桩和半刚性桩复合地基的核心技术之一。

sentences.english: Cushion is a core part in the rigid and semirigid composite foundation.
sentences.chinese: 褥垫层是刚性桩和半刚性桩复合地基的核心技术之一。

sentences.english: Foundation soil is usually considered to be rigid in the aseismic engineering design.
sentences.chinese: 在建筑结构的抗震工程设计中通常假定地基为刚性的。

sentences.english: Whole body casting, rigid and stable performance.
sentences.chinese: 机身整体铸造，刚性好，性能稳定。

sentences.english: The column was formed integrally within a relatively rigid frame .
sentences.chinese: 柱子与一个具备相当刚性的框架形成整体。

sentences.english: Stiffness structure, powerful slide seat design, high processing precision, and long service lift.
sentences.chinese: 刚性结构，强力滑座设计，加工精度高，寿命长。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the rigid material model is suitable for the premade fragment.
sentences.chinese: 程序中对预制破片采用刚性材料模型是合理可行的。

sentences.english: A postoperative semirigid cervical collar was prescribed for 2 months.
sentences.chinese: 手术后嘱患者2个月内戴半刚性的颈托。

sentences.english: The rigid jointer is replaced by the flexible jointer in a revolving system.
sentences.chinese: 用柔性联接器代替旋转系统各转子之间的刚性联接。
